thalmor_overarching_arc.name: The Thalmor Conspiracy
thalmor_overarching_arc.description: The Aldmeri Dominion's sinister long-term plans for Skyrim and the Empire

arcs.name: Perpetual Warfare
arcs.description: The Thalmor secretly work to ensure neither the Empire nor Stormcloaks achieve decisive victory

phases.name: Intelligence Gathering
objectives: Monitor both Imperial and Stormcloak movements
Identify key leaders and weak points
Establish spy network in major holds
phases.player_discovery: Can be discovered by infiltrating Thalmor Embassy

phases.name: Subtle Interference
objectives: Eliminate moderate voices calling for peace
phases.player_discovery: Documents found at embassy or intercepted communications

phases.name: Direct Action
objectives: Assassinate key leaders if one side gains advantage
phases.player_discovery: Witness Thalmor agents working with enemies

consequences.if_completed: Civil war drags on for years, Skyrim and Empire both weakened
consequences.if_stopped: One side wins decisively, Skyrim becomes stronger

arcs.name: The Talos Heresy
arcs.description: Systematic elimination of Talos worship as required by White-Gold Concordat

phases.name: Arrest and Interrogation
phases.player_discovery: Witness arrests or meet imprisoned worshippers

phases.name: Total Suppression
objectives: Destroy all Talos shrines in Skyrim

consequences.if_completed: Talos worship driven completely underground, Nordic culture suppressed
consequences.if_stopped: Talos worship remains, Thalmor influence weakened

arcs.name: Eradicating the Blades
arcs.description: Complete the purge of the Blades begun during the Great War

phases.name: Hunt for Survivors
objectives: Interrogate those who might know their locations
phases.player_discovery: Find execution orders or interrogation records

phases.name: Elimination
objectives: Destroy Sky Haven Temple if discovered
phases.player_discovery: Assassination attempts on Delphine and Esbern

consequences.if_completed: Blades permanently destroyed, dragon-hunting knowledge lost

elenwen.name: Elenwen
elenwen.title: First Emissary to Skyrim
elenwen.goals: Execute all Thalmor objectives in Skyrim
elenwen.combat_stats: Great (+4) Deceive, Good (+3) Will, Good (+3) Lore

ancano.name: Ancano
ancano.title: Thalmor Advisor at College of Winterhold
ancano.goals: Seize the Eye of Magnus for the Dominion

ondolemar.name: Ondolemar
ondolemar.title: Thalmor Justiciar in Markarth
ondolemar.goals: Root out Talos worship in the Reach

thalmor_soldiers.name: Thalmor Soldiers/Justiciars
thalmor_soldiers.typical_stats: Fair (+2) Fight, Fair (+2) Shoot, Average (+1) Stealth

running_thalmor_arc: Thalmor should feel like ever-present threat, not just random encounters
Make players discover plots gradually through investigation
Allow players to disrupt Thalmor plans but with consequences
Elenwen should be difficult to reach - protected by diplomatic immunity
Thalmor are intelligent - they adapt to player actions
discovery_methods: Documents found during Diplomatic Immunity quest
Informants who defect or are turned
balancing_threat: Thalmor work behind the scenes, not open warfare
Players should feel clever when disrupting plots
Some plots may succeed despite player efforts
Thalmor remember player actions - create ongoing antagonism
Post-dragon crisis: Thalmor refocus entirely on civil war manipulation
